Do you want to quit without saving?: Do you want to quit without saving?
Minesweeper is game where your objetive: Minesweeper is game where your objetive is reveal the field, avoiding the mines. Try not to explode yourself!
In the settings menu, you are able to se: In the settings menu, you are able to select the game difficulty, impacting on the field size and number of mines.
If you click on a cell with the left mou: If you click on a cell with the left mouse button, you will reveal the cell content. A cell may have a number, according to the number of mines on adjacent cells.
If the clicked cell has a mine, the game: If the clicked cell has a mine, the game is finished immediatly, and the field is revealed for you.
With the right mouse button, you can put: With the right mouse button, you can put a flag on a cell. It is usefull to mark the cells you think there is a mine.
